Interface PartyAuthMechService

    • Method Detail

      • signUpUser

        java.lang.String signUpUser(java.lang.String partyName,
                          java.lang.String partyLastName,
                          java.lang.String authMech,
                          java.lang.String partyAuthid,
                          java.lang.String partyAuthtoken,
                          java.lang.String ptyDeviceToken,
                          java.lang.String ptyDeviceType)
                            throws javax.mail.MessagingException,
                                   PartyExistException
        Parameters:
        partyName - party first name.
        partyLastName - party last name.
        authMech - it has a constant text "SL".The SL represent app user.
        partyAuthid - party login email address.
        partyAuthtoken - party login password.
        ptyDeviceToken - it is automatically detect from party using mobile device.
        ptyDeviceType - it is type party using mobile os (ios / Andriod).
        Returns:
        return last inserted party id.
        Throws:
        javax.mail.MessagingException - Exception thrown when the message content empty.
        PartyExistException - Exception thrown when entered party is already exist in database.

      • verifyEmail

        java.lang.String verifyEmail(java.lang.String partyAuthid,
                           java.lang.String mailVerifyCode)
                             throws WrongVerifyCodeException,
                                    PartyNotFoundException
        This method used to verify the user by checking the verification code.
        Parameters:
        partyAuthid - party email address.
        mailVerifyCode - party verification code. When the party successfully registered this code sent to the registered email address.
        Returns:
        returns JSONObject that has a value of success message.
        Throws:
        WrongVerifyCodeException - Exception thrown when temporary verification code does not match with user's entered code.
        PartyNotFoundException - Exception thrown when entered party is not found.

      • resendCode

        java.lang.String resendCode(java.lang.String partyName,
                          java.lang.String partyLastName,
                          java.lang.String authId,
                          java.lang.String partyAuthid,
                          java.lang.String partyAuthtoken)
        It is used to resend the verification code to the user when the party doesn't received.
        Parameters:
        partyName - party first name
        partyLastName - party last name
        authId - type of the user (app / instagram).
        partyAuthid - party registered email address.
        partyAuthtoken - password.
        Returns:
        return string message success / failure.

      • signIn

        java.lang.String signIn(java.lang.String authId,
                      java.lang.String partyAuthid,
                      java.lang.String partyAuthtoken,
                      java.lang.String deviceToken,
                      java.lang.String deviceType)
        This method allow user to sign in the app.
        Parameters:
        authId - type of party (app / instagram user).
        partyAuthid - party registered email address.
        partyAuthtoken - party registered password.
        deviceToken - it is automatically detect from party using mobile device.
        deviceType - it is type party using mobile os (ios / Andriod).
        Returns:
        returns JSONObject that has a value of party id with user session values.

      • forgetPwd

        java.lang.String forgetPwd(java.lang.String authId,
                         java.lang.String partyAuthid)
        If the party forgot the login password they can able to get password using this method.
        Parameters:
        authId - type of the user.
        partyAuthid - party registered email address.
        Returns:
        it will return success or failure message.

      • resetPwd

        java.lang.String resetPwd(java.lang.String authId,
                        java.lang.String pamAuthId,
                        java.lang.String pamAuthToken,
                        java.lang.String newPamAuthToken)
        This method allow user to update new password.
        Parameters:
        authId - type of the user.
        pamAuthId - party registered email address.
        pamAuthToken - temporary password. Party received email with temporary password.
        newPamAuthToken - party new password.
        Returns:
        return success or failure message.

      • signupWithInstagram

        java.lang.String signupWithInstagram(java.lang.String authId,
                                   java.lang.String authCode,
                                   java.lang.String deviceToken,
                                   java.lang.String deviceType)
                                     throws com.mashape.unirest.http.exceptions.UnirestException,
                                            WrongAccessTokenException
        If the user have instagram access they can able to access the app using own instagram account.
        Parameters:
        authId - it has a constant value "IN".
        authCode - instagram auth code.
        deviceToken - it is automatically detect from party using mobile device.
        deviceType - it is type party using mobile os (ios / Andriod).
        Returns:
        returns JSONObject that has a value of party id.
        Throws:
        com.mashape.unirest.http.exceptions.UnirestException - Exception thrown when the http connection fails.
        WrongAccessTokenException - Exception thrown when entered access token of instagram is wrong or not a valid one.
